mapper.sql: SELECT T1.ROW_ID as id /*记录编号*/ ,T1.CREATED as created /*创建时间*/ ,T1.CREATED_BY as createdBy /*创建者ID*/ ,date_format(T1.LAST_UPD, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as lastUpdated /*最后更新时间*/ ,T1.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy /*最后更新者ID*/ ,T1.CORP_ID as corpid /*公司账套*/ ,GET_LOV_NAME(#{usercorpid},'DOC_DATA_TYPE',T1.TYPE) as type /*类型*/ ,GET_LOV_NAME(#{usercorpid},'S_IF',T1.IF_NECESSARY) as ifNecessary /*是否必要*/ ,T1.MENU_LINE_ID as menuLineId /*与主菜单line表的关联条件*/ ,T1.PARAM_NAME as paramName /*名称*/ ,T1.param as param /*参数*/ ,T1.menu_describe as menuDescribe /*描述*/
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LNK_DOC_PARAM( ROW_ID /*记录ID*/ ,TYPE /*类型*/ ,IF_NECESSARY /*是否必要*/ ,MENU_LINE_ID /*与主菜单line表的关联条件*/ ,PARAM_NAME /*名称*/ ,param /*参数*/ ,menu_describe /*描述*/ ) values (
#{id} /*记录ID*/ ,#{type} /*类型*/ ,#{ifNecessary} /*是否必要*/ ,#{menuLineId} /*与主菜单line表的关联条件*/ ,#{paramName} /*名称*/ ,#{param} /*参数*/ ,#{menuDescribe} /*描述*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE LNK_DOC_PARAM SET TYPE =#{type} /*类型*/ ,IF_NECESSARY =#{ifNecessary} /*是否必要*/ ,PARAM_NAME =#{paramName} /*名称*/ ,param =#{param} /*参数*/ ,menu_describe=#{menuDescribe} /*描述*/ WHERE ROW_ID=#{id}
